movie.title: Operation Finale
movie.plot: A team of secret agents set out to track down the Nazi officer who masterminded the Holocaust.

events.title: Adolf Eichmann is captured in Buenos Aires
Adolf Eichmann is flown out of Buenos Aires to Israel
